## 3

```
> z <- c(1, 2, 3, NA, 4, NA, 5, NA)
> z[!is.na(z)]
[1] 1 2 3 4 5
> mean(z, trim=0, na.rm=TRUE)
[1] 3
> mean(z, trim=0, na.rm=FALSE)
[1] NA

```
